item.title: ‘Resident Evil Requiem’ Update, ‘Outer Worlds 2’ Release Date, ‘Lego Batman’ Reveal and More From Gamescom 2025
item.description: The four-day Gamescom begins in earnest in Cologne, Germany on Wednesday, but the party started Tuesday with big announcements made about buzzy video game titles during the Opening Night Live event. A
